title: How does economic globalization affect students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, Globalization is a byproduct of technological change. Telecommunications, TV, fast ships, airplanes, cars, travel, the internet and social media, all have made the world more connected and more accessible, both in reality as well as in our perception. That has also change the mindset of every body but more on students by gaining new knowledge and new skills added to their university certification to explore the labour market. With their own creativity and new skills they have already gained, that would generate revenue to themselves, when they showcase their various products to the market that people already have desired for.
